text:
National Association of Educational broadcasters
134:6 CONNECTICUT AVENUE
WASHINGTON 6, D. C.
October 12, 19 61
Mr. Samuel L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
State University of Iowa
609 10th Avenue
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
I am in hopes that your Research Committee can meet in
connection with the Convention and discuss the possibilities
of an NAEB Audience Survey Service along the lines we dis¬
cussed in our correspondence.
Most of the Committees are meeting Monday morning and I
am sure there is still time for you to make arrangements
for this.
I’m off this week for a quick trip to Holland to represent the
NAEB in the dedication ceremonies of Radio Nederlands.
Look forward to seeing you later this month.
Cordially,
WGH/mmm
